Sergey Borisovich Brilev (Russian: Сергей Борисович Брилёв) is a Russian journalist, TV anchor and writer, multi-winner of Russia's top TV prize TEFI. He is also known for participating in global informational, scientific, energetical and political projects such as Global Energy Prize. Due to his origins, he has close ties to Latin America and the United Kingdom, where many of his activities are concentrated.
He is the deputy director of the TV Channel Rossiya 1 for ad hoc information projects, PhD in history, President of the Global Energy Association (Moscow), co-founder and president of the Bering-Bellingshausen Institute for the Americas (IBBA: Montevideo, Uruguay), member of the governing Board of the Council for Foreign and Defence Policy (Russia's oldest NGO), WE-speaker with the World Energy Council (London).
